animations

Class Sprite

  • java.lang.Object
    • animations.Sprite

  • public class Sprite
extends java.lang.Object
    The Sprite class. This class implements the code for sprites. Sprites are representations of images in games and some other programs. It represents moving images.
    Since:
    8-8-2014
    Version:
    9-8-2014
    Author:
    stefanboodt
    See Also:
    Image, Animation

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Sprite(Animation anim)
      Creates a new Sprite with the given animation.

      Gets the acceleration of the y.
      int getHeight()
      Gets the height of the sprite, which is the heigth of the current image.

      Gets the image currently displayed by the Sprite.

      Gets the width of the sprite, which is the width of the current image.

      Gets the x value of the sprite.

      Gets the y value of the sprite.

      • Sprite

        Parameters:
        anim - The used animation.

    • Method Detail

      • update

        public void update(long time)
        Updates the sprite and forwards it the given amount of time. It updates the hidden animation as well as the position of the sprite.
        Parameters:
        time - The amount of time in milliseconds that passed.
